ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that when a delegate approver is specified on the Approver object, both delegation start and end dates must be provided, and the end date must be after the start date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(sbaa__DelegatedApprover__c)), OR( ISBLANK(sbaa__DelegationStart__c), ISBLANK(sbaa__DelegationEnd__c), sbaa__DelegationEnd__c < sbaa__DelegationStart__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify both start and end dates for the delegation period, and ensure the end date is after the start date.
